ALT TOWNSVILLE 25-28 SEP
# TRY ANY
# 25MT * 2TIERS OKAY / STEEL FRIENDLY
# AUSSIE GRAIN OK
# BOXY TYPE

INLACO HARMONY
BUILT 2013, PANAMA FLAG
DWT 33,379MT ON 10.084M (SUMMER)
TPC ABT 45.26 (FULL SUMMER)
GROSS/NET : 21,168/10,765
LOA 176.83M / BEAM 28.80M
5HA/5HO, TTL 43,205.40CBM (GRAIN)
4 X 30.7MT CRANES
DAILY SPEED/CONSUMPTION AT SEA
(B) ABT 13.50 KTS ON ABT 21.20MT IFO + ABT 0.1MT MGO
(L) ABT 13.50 KTS ON ABT 23.20MT IFO + ABT 0.1MT MGO
DAILY ECO SPEED/CONSUMPTION AT SEA (ALWAYS WOG)
(B) ABT 12.00 KTS ON ABT 16.50MT IFO + 0.1MT MGO
(L) ABT 12.00 KTS ON ABT 16.80MT IFO + 0.1MT MGO
PORT CONSUMPTION
(I) IFO ABT 2.9MT DAILY + 0.2MT MGO
(W)  IFO ABT 4.9MT DAILY + 0.2MT MGO
VLSFO: very low sulphur fuel oil,  max 0.50% S
LSMGO: low sulphur Marine Gas oil, max 0.10% S
IFO/MGO to be supplied in accordance with ISO8217:2010 specs but in case ISO 8217:2010 specs should not be available, Owners accept Charterers to supply bunkers in line with ISO 8217:2005 specs instead.
END.
B.RGDS / MANUEL
MOB: 91-9840446665,
AS BROKERS ONLY
E. & O. E.
All details about and given in good faith.
SKYPE: manuel13291
